titles.title: Now Unto Him Who is Able to Keep You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Now unto Him Who is able to keep you
Who is able to keep you from stumbling

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And to make you stand in the presence
Of His glory blameless with great joy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To the only God our Saviour
Through Jesus Christ our Lord
Be all glory majesty dominion and power
Before all time both now and forever

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Amen and amen
Amen and amen
Amen and amen
Amen and amen and amen
